details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.2.10 Fonts - 6.2.10.5 Font metrics
details.description: For every font embedded in a conforming file, the glyph width information in the font dictionary and in the embedded font program shall be consistent for every glyph referenced for rendering. Glyphs that are referenced only with rendering mode 3 are exempt from this requirement.

rule.description: For every font embedded in a conforming file, the glyph width information in the font dictionary and in the embedded font program shall be consistent for every glyph referenced for rendering. Glyphs that are referenced only with rendering mode 3 are exempt from this requirement.
rule.test: renderingMode == 3 || widthFromFontProgram == null || widthFromDictionary == null || Math.abs(widthFromFontProgram - widthFromDictionary) <= 1

error.message: Glyph width %1 in the embedded font program is not consistent with the Widths entry of the font dictionary (value %2)
